experiences.description: I develop applications using ReactJS, TypeScript, and Next.js, optimizing backoffice and e-commerce platforms. Additionally, I provide technical support, resolving issues and ensuring systems run smoothly. I combine technical skills with attention to detail to enhance user experience and operational efficiency.

experiences.companyName: Wholesale Business Group for Goods and Other Consumer Uses
experiences.description: I developed a business management system using Symfony, PHP, and PostgreSQL, focusing on basic unit accounting. I followed the MVC pattern and Scrum methodology, implementing inventory, customer, supplier, and billing modules.
